detaileddescription.para: Draw orientations for the slider. It can be drawn verticaly or horizontaly.
Constructor. Scale start is 0.

parameterdescription.para: the end of the slider scale.

detaileddescription.para: Constructor.
Destructor.
Sets the scale.
Gets the scale start.
Sets the scale start.
Gets the scale end.
Sets the scale end.
Gets the current value.
Sets the current value.
Draws the marker.

parameterdescription.para: a graphics object to draw with.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the length of the marker.
Gets the length of the marker.
Sets the orientation of the slider. A slider can be drawn verticaly or horizontaly. For orientation, see the enum in this class.
Gets the orientation of the slider. Se the enum in this class.
Sets the step length. Step length is used when the keys left and right are pressed.
Gets the step length.

Draws the Widget. It is called by the parent widget when it is time for the Widget to draw itself. The graphics object is set up so that all drawing is relative to the Widget, i.e coordinate (0,0) is the top-left corner of the Widget. It is not possible to draw outside of a Widgets dimension.

parameterdescription.para: a Graphics object to draw with.

detaileddescription.para: Draws a the Widget border. A border is drawn around a Widget. The width and height of the border is therefore the Widgets height+2*bordersize. Think of a painting that has a certain size, the border surrounds the painting.

parameterdescription.para: a Graphics object to draw with.

detaileddescription.para: Called if the Widget loses focus.
Called when a mouse button is pressed when the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.
NOTE: A mouse press is NOT equal to a mouse click. Use mouseClickMessage to check for mouse clicks.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.

detaileddescription.para: Called when a mouse button is released when the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the mouse moves and the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.

detaileddescription.para: Called if a key is pressed when the widget has keyboard focus. If a key is held down the widget will generate multiple key presses.
Converts a marker position to a value.

simplesect.para: the value corresponding to the position.

detaileddescription.para: Converts a value to a marker position.

simplesect.para: the position corresponding to the value.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the marker position for the current value.

simplesect.para: the marker position for the current value.

detaileddescription.para: A slider able to slide between different values. You can set the scale of the slider yourself so that it ranges between, for example, -1.0 and 2.0.
